description: Monitor for abnormal usage of the GFlags tool as well as common processes spawned under abnormal parents and/or with creation flags indicative of debugging such as DEBUG_PROCESS and DEBUG_ONLY_THIS_PROCESS. (Citation: Microsoft Dev Blog IFEO Mar 2010)

external_references.description: Shanbhag, M. (2010, March 24). Image File Execution Options (IFEO). Retrieved December 18, 2017.
